text: Derek Martinus (born Derek Buitenhuis, 4 April 1931 â€“ 27 March 2014)Michael Billington and Toby Hadoke Obituary: Derek Martinus, The Guardian, 1 April 2014 was a British television and theatre director. He directed episodes of Z-Cars and Doctor Who. Martinus also appeared in some plays, mostly based on Shakespeare. He also directed the award-winning The Paper Lads.
